name: Buella
text:
Buella
"How you?"
Buella was a criminal associate of Dale Cooper's doppelganger in South Dakota.
Biography
The doppelganger visited Buella's house, greeted Otis, and then asked Buella if she had Ray and Darya "back there." Cooper also suggested she post a better guard at her front door, as he had easily incapacitated Robby when he arrived. She commented, "It's a world of truck drivers," before retrieving Ray and Darya for him.
